name: Turbo Trabbi
description:
Casual puzzle game about steering your trabbi through chaotic traffic.

Left-click for turbo. 

The car automatically steers towards the pointer.

Remember to buy upgrades from the shop.

Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Music: https://freesound.org/people/bebeto/sounds/554/
Motor sound: https://freesound.org/people/alister667/sounds/11704/
